#summary Classes provided in Samstyle PHP Framework

= Introduction =

Samstyle PHP Framework contains several classes that are readily available in the framework itself. We've built them for your convenience.

Class files are all found in the folder `class`.

= List of Classes =

Here is a list of classes available in Samstyle PHP Framework and their purpose.

|| *Class* || *Filename* || *Functionality and Support* ||
|| bit || bit.class.php || To support the manipulation of bits ||
|| firebug || firebug.class.php || Support server-side debugging with Firebug ||
|| form || form.class.php || Provides support for form generation ||
|| html || html.class.php || Support for HTML code generation ||
|| http || http.class.php || Provides support for HTTP ||
|| php || php.class.php || Provides added support and functionality to current PHP's pool of functions ||
|| pwd || pwd.class.php || Password hashing with secured salting and verification ||
|| validate || validate.class.php || validates variables against certain patterns and so on ||
